decks.notes: The main concept of this combo-reanimator Legacy deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bring them back onto the battlefield with Reanimate and Animate Dead. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high-powered creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes cards like Brazen Borrower and Orcish Bowmasters for additional versatility and removal options.

This deck focuses on using disruption and removal to control the board while quickly deploying powerful threats to pressure the opponent. By efficiently utilizing cards like Force of Will, Stifle, and Daze, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Murktide Regent, Troll of Khazad-dûm, and Brazen Borrower to quickly close out the game. With a combination of tempo plays and aggressive creatures, the Dimir Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they can establish their own game plan.

The main focus of this Dragon Stompy deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while quickly deploying aggressive threats like Goblin Rabblemaster and Broadside Bombardiers. The deck also includes powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Chrome Mox to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. By locking down the opponent's mana resources and applying pressure with fast creatures, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This Legacy Goblins deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Goblin creatures. The key strategy involves playing cheap and efficient Goblin creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Muxus, Goblin Grandee, while using cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to accelerate mana production. Cavern of Souls ensures that Goblins can't be countered, while cards like The One Ring and Broadside Bombardiers provide additional buffs and effects to further increase the pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to win the game quickly through relentless aggression and efficient creature synergies.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Troll of Khazad-dûm and Archon of Cruelty, using cards like Grief and Entomb, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck aims to create a powerful board presence by cheating out high-cost creatures early in the game, overwhelming the opponent before they have a chance to respond. The inclusion of disruptive cards like Force of Will and Daze helps protect the combo pieces and maintain control of the game.

This Legacy aggro deck focuses on deploying a high number of artifact creatures quickly, while utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Lotus Petal to ramp up mana. The aim is to overwhelm the opponent with early creature aggression, supported by cards like Metallic Rebuke for control and disruption. Urza's Saga is a key card in generating additional artifacts to power up the deck's synergies. Overall, the deck aims to establish a fast and powerful board presence to win the game before the opponent can adequately respond.
